trends: There have been no other sightings in Ripplemead
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing at the back door smoking.I noticed a very brite light thatchanged from red to white.I first thought man those are very bright anticollision lights.I watched it and it just moved in in what appeared to be a veryslow tight circle.then it faded out.I was just about to come back in and it justreappeared in the same spot.It did this several times. The duration was about15-20 mins.Then it made a sudden movement to the side got very brite and thenjust faded out.
